text: Barney Bear is an American series of animated cartoon short movies. It was made by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer cartoon studio. The title character is an anthropomorphic bear who just wants peace and quiet. The 26 Barney Bear cartoons were made between 1939 until 1954.
